title: One I upgrade to tier 2 champion icon, it is worth to keep buying them?
body: Since I don't want to spend RP, is it worth to buy the championship icons after receiving the tier 2 championship icon? I don't plan on buying a team icon so as far I as I know the only thing the jewels can be used for is the one icon so far.

replies.body:
If you're meaning the *Championship Jewel Tokens*, then probably not. If you aren't going to be using them to upgrade any more Icons, there's not really a point in spending your IP for Loot currency that you won't be doing anything with.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Hi, I just bought one more team icon. But I can't see the tier 2 and tier 3 for that icon in my inventory. So it means I just can use the championship jewels for only one team icon?? Or there are something wrong in my account????
Since you have to craft them, they'll be in your *Hextech Crafting Inventory*. [Grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) if you're still not seeing them.

I bought the icon, the tier 2 and tier will come to my account right?? Yea, I did a lot by that way, but I still can't see them. It looks like this may have been caused by a bug that allowed some players to purchase 2016 Craftable Icons without being charged, but also caused you not to get the craftable parts of the icon. If you're inclined to still craft this Icon, you can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help sort this out.
